name: jobs
description: TDD-in-a-Box is a ready-to-run starter bundle that wires Task-master task orchestration, Autopilot’s RED→GREEN→COMMIT loop, and mandatory guardrails into any repository so automated agents and humans can ship code safely.

scripts.preinstall: echo 'Forcing task-master-ai to version 0.34.0' && npm install task-master-ai@0.34.0 --no-save
